headline: SPECTRUM SUPER BOWL AD SPOTLIGHTS ITS ROLE AS AMERICA'S CONNECTIVITY COMPANY™, POWERING THE PEOPLE WHO POWER THE NATION
summary: This Super Bowl, Spectrum shines a light on the everyday drive and determination of people across the country with a new commercial that celebrates those who work hard, work together, and don't back down when things are tough. Backing them in their quest to achieve true greatness is America's Connectivity Company™, which is powered by Spectrum's 100% U.S.-built Fiber Broadband Network.
